name: Garbage Collector (Sudo Su Games)
description:
Collect as much material as possible with your sticky spaceship to grow and boost your score ! But watch out for enemies who will try to shoot you down !

- Move right and left by clicking on the sides of the screen to move and rotate accross the galaxy, you will collect material on contact.
- Enemy spaceships will come as you keep growing, use your materials to protect yourself against laser shots
- Your spaceship doesn't have guns, you need to use your materials to destroy enemy ships and collect bonuses.
- Collect stars to increase your score multiplicator !
